# Welcome to the Gapminder Analysis Website

This website presents a new analysis of the Gapminder dataset, which covers 142 countries from 1952 to 2007. Explore the data through the following pages:

-   [LifeExp vs GDP](life-gdp.qmd) <!-- Analysis of life expectancy vs GDP per capita -->
-   [LifeExp vs Population](life-population.qmd) <!-- Analysis of life expectancy vs population -->
-   [Country Trends](country.qmd) <!-- Trends for a specific country -->
